component.name: Statistics Card
component.description: A statistics card component specifically designed for presenting key metrics, performance indicators, and important data points. Displays titles, values, trends, and comparative data with visual indicators, icons, and customizable styling for dashboard applications.

variants.name: Minimalist
variants.description: A professional statistics card implementation with clear data presentation, visual trend indicators, responsive design, and polished appearance. Effectively showcases metrics and KPIs with professional styling and visual feedback suitable for business dashboards.

variants.name: Bootstrap 5
variants.description: Statistics Card implementation in Bootstrap 5 style

variants.name: Glassmorphism
variants.description: Statistics Card implementation in Glassmorphism style

variants.name: Ant Design
variants.description: Statistics Card implementation in Ant Design style

variants.name: Neumorphism
variants.description: Statistics Card implementation in Neumorphism style
